mapper.select: select e.name,m.* from employee e,mobilize m where e.id=m.employee_id ORDER BY m.transfer_date DESC
select e.name,m.* from employee e,mobilize m where e.id=m.employee_id and m.employee_id=#{id} ORDER BY m.transfer_date DESC
select e.name,m.employee_id,e.position,e.department_id,count(m.employee_id) as count from mobilize m left join employee e on m.employee_id=e.id GROUP BY(m.employee_id) HAVING count(m.employee_id)>0
select t.*,e.name from task t,employee e where e.id=t.employee_id
